title: Leading hair conditioner brands in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Sales in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Organix and lowest at Brand L'Oréal EverPure.
The highest Brand Organix has 104.7 more Sales in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Brand L'Oréal EverPure.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Organix has the highest Sales in million U.S. dollars and L'Oréal EverPure has the lowest Sales in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Sales in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Organix and lowest at Brand L'Oréal EverPure.
The highest Brand Organix has 104.7 more Sales in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Brand L'Oréal EverPure.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Brand Organix and lowest at Brand L'Oréal EverPure.
The second highest Sales in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Brand Shea Moisture.
The highest Brand Organix has 104.7 more Sales in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Brand L'Oréal EverPure.
Sales in million U.S. dollars at Brand Organix is 133.7 , second place is Shea Moisture at 77.1, and thirdly is Garnier Whole Blends at 63.0.
Considered together, the average Sales in million U.S. dollars in all 10 Brands is roughly 55.87.
